title: Microsoft Power Platform
subTitle: Building interactive, data-driven dashboards with Power BI
overviewContent: Microsoft Power BI was leveraged to develop interactive, data-driven dashboards that support informed business decision-making. Multiple data sources were integrated to provide real-time insights, with key metrics visualised in intuitive, easy-to-understand formats. The dashboards facilitated faster and more accurate reporting, contributing to improved operational efficiency and enhanced data visibility across projects.
